name: Generate  URL
func:
msg.payload = "https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/v2/auth?scope=https%3A//www.googleapis.com/auth/" + env.get("Scope") + "&access_type=offline&prompt=consent&include_granted_scopes=true&response_type=code&redirect_uri=" + env.get("Redirect") +"&client_id=" + env.get("Client_id");
return msg;

params_deviceStatusLog

sql:
SELECT deviceid,
       Datetime(timestamp, 'localtime') AS timestamp,
       friendlyName,
       inputids,
       batpercentage,
       batcurrent,
       maxchargecurrent,
       tempinaxp192,
       powermode,
       currentbrightness,
       currentscreen,
       webportalactive,
       ntp,
       ssid,
       rssi,
       ip,
       hostname
FROM   devicestatuslog T1
WHERE  1 = 1
       AND EXISTS (SELECT 1
                   FROM   devicestatuslog T2
                   WHERE  T2.timestamp >= Datetime('now', '-2 minutes')
                          AND T1.deviceid = T2.deviceid
                   GROUP  BY T2.deviceid
                   HAVING Max(t2.timestamp) = T1.timestamp)
name: Select Recent
params_devices

sql:
INSERT INTO deviceConfig 
VALUES ($deviceId, $friendlyName, $sessionId)
    ON CONFLICT(deviceId) DO UPDATE 
    SET friendlyName=excluded.friendlyName, sessionId=excluded.sessionId
name: deviceConfig
params_sessions

sql:
DELETE FROM sessions
WHERE sessionId = $sessionId and $timestamp is not null
name: sessions
hash

sql:
INSERT INTO sqlHistory 
VALUES ($sqlHash, $sqlStatement, datetime(), datetime(), 1)
    ON CONFLICT(sqlHash) DO UPDATE 
    SET lastExecution = datetime(), countExecution = countExecution+1;
name: sqlHistory

sql:
SELECT sqlStatement AS sql_statement
  FROM sqlHistory
 ORDER BY lastExecution DESC
name: sqlHistory
options
SQL Statement

sql:
SELECT dc.friendlyName
     , dir.deviceId
     , dir.inputSource
     , dir.inputId
     , src.inputName
  FROM device_input_rltn dir
  LEFT JOIN deviceConfig dc ON dir.deviceId = dc.deviceId
  LEFT JOIN inputConfig src ON dir.inputId = src.inputId and dir.inputSource = src.inputSource
name: device_input_rltn
deviceConfig

sql:
SELECT inputId, inputName, inputSource
  FROM inputConfig
name: inputConfig
inputConfig

sfc_source:
<!-- IFrame - Widget to embed something smallish from another site.
     Copyright 2021 Thorsten von Eicken, MIT license, see LICENSE file
-->
<template>
  <iframe :src="payload" frameborder="0" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>
</template>

<style scoped>
  iframe {
    padding: 4px 4px 4px 4px;
    border: 0px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-position: center top;
  }
</style>

<script scoped>
  export default {
  name: 'IFrame',
  // help displayed in the UI: the first line is used in the widgets menu and is always shown in
  // the edit card. Successive lines can be expanded in the card and are markdown-formatted.
  help: `Embed another site.
The IFrame widget embeds another site. This is handy to embed a chart or image. To embed a
full page see the i-frame grid.`,

  props: {
    payload: { type: String, default: 'https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19274367/' +
                                      '45430032-b6a5a180-b6a4-11e8-9645-a0497ef044f3.png'},
  },

}
</script>

name: function YT
func:
msg.output_value = "https://www.youtube.com/embed/"+msg.payload+"?autoplay=1";
return msg;
